name: Pop Sanic Go!
description:
The greatest game of ALL time!
A new little meme Adventure.
Pop SanicGo! is a match game where you can tap and make your favorite furry character pop and earn lot of points !
that's right, touch them and make them pop , complete the goals and get rewards!
use power ups to pass through those annoying levels and discover the new areas.

Thank you all for the support, please share.
